lines.text: You know, I never asked you what you do for a living.

Well... besides dancing a lot, I fly Pan Am from coast to coast. I'm Pam, flying ace. That's actually a slight airline joke. I don't really fly the planes. I'm just a stewardess. I flying waitress as they call it. How about you?
Me?
Yes. What do you do for a living?

[sarcastic tone]
I'm an international terrorist wanted by the police in half the countries in Europe. And I am currently laying low for the moment.
Oh, sure!
There is no security.
Lieutenant? I just got these latest transfer orders from the Captain.
Yeah, don't sing me any operas. I'm not feeling well right now and I'm in a bad mood.
I'm not gonna sing any operas. I'm talking about these transfer orders. Come on, Munafo. I've been working Decoy for nine years and now I'm pulled and I'd like to know why.

Hey, don't start with me. It's Lieutenant. You don't know me well enough to call me Munafo. But I know you, DaSilva. The gung-ho Lone Ranger of the street crime unit. Well, you can forget about that because we've been asked to cooperate with a special federal/state unit, and we will. You and Fox have been assigned to an ATAC unit.
Come on! Terrorism is hijackers and hostages. That's FBI stuff. What the hell do they want with us?
I don't know. Your service records may have something to do with it. How many times have you been hospitalized last year? Five? Well, consider this squad a vacation from Decoy.
I don't need a vacation.
Yes, you do. Now, they need someone who knows the local rat holes and you're nominated. Anything goes down, you're the man.
You mind telling me where this came from?

From the Commissioner, and he got it from Washington. They're sending a specialist from Europe... Interpol... to help organize it in conjunction with Federal funding. And this department will extend every courtesy. Do you understand?

[grabs Munafo]
No, I don't understand...
Get your hands off me! Understand this, sucker! You're a cop and you'll go where you're assigned! Now, you and Tonto be here at eight o'clock tomorrow, sharp! End of story!
Why'd you kill the woman?
I wanted to.
So why don't you kill me?
In due time.
Oh, for Christ's sake, DaSilva! Come off this cop on the beat mentality! Your wife left you for it! Wasn't that enough!
I didn't join the police force to kill people.
I represent the oppressed, the powerless of the world. I am their voice. I am a liberator.

[disbelieving]
You think you're a liberator?

[smiles knowingly]
It fascinates you. Yes, it does.
What are the chances that this "Wulfgar" has gone into hiding or retired?
Detective Fox, is it? The answer to your question of whether Wulfgar has gone into hiding or retired is neither one. He's only just begun.
Are you here for business or pleasure?
Pleasure, I hope.
Welcome to the United States.
